caption.p: ( A) Temperature dependent PL spectra of CLSO:0.20Dy 3+/0.20Sm 3+ phosphor in the range of 303–423 K. ( B) The chromaticity diagram of CLSO:0.20Dy 3+ (0.286,0.312) and CLSO:0.20Dy 3+/0.20Sm 3+ (0.309,0.309) phosphors, and digital photograph shows that “FU” and “JIE” are spelled using CLSO:0.20Dy 3+ and CLSO:0.20Dy 3+/0.20Sm 3+ phosphors at 365 nm excitation respectively.
